mil7.8.5:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘agadassa dve angani gahetabbani’ti yam vadesi, katamani tani dve angani gahetabbani”ti.
mil7.8.5:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena manase kilesa na santhapetabba.
mil7.8.5:1.4: Idam, maharaja, agadassa pathamam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.8.5:2.1: Puna caparam, maharaja, agado datthaphutthaditthaasitapitakhayitasayitam sabbam visam patihanati;
mil7.8.5:2.2: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena ragadosamohamanaditthivisam sabbam patihanitabbam.
mil7.8.5:2.3: Idam, maharaja, agadassa dutiyam angam gahetabbam.
